name: Guardead
description:
GUARDEAD
Your goal is to find a key and then find a door while running between several guards and security cameras.

If you stand close to the blue locker and press SPACE to hide in it (It's a little buggy so you need to press few times to work).
I made my own assets and found some old music I've made so I used it and used Exuin sprite maker for player and guards.

Made in like >4h, because there was some issue.
The game is not easy, but possible. And I know its buggy :I
